name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Front-End Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions, specializing in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**. Proficient in employing **React**, with hands-on experience in utilizing front-end testing frameworks such as **Jest**, **React Testing Library**, and **Cypress** to ensure robust application performance. Well-versed in agile development methodologies and version control using **Git**. 
Additionally, skilled in back-end technologies including **Python** and **Django**, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of the software development lifecycle. With a strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, I excel at building secure, maintainable solutions that comply with industry standards. My experience extends to **Synthetic Monitoring** and **Observability**, which are critical for enhancing application performance and reliability. Passionate about creating impactful solutions that bridge complexity with usability, driving both technical excellence and real-world results.
